alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 5:51AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 630 AM EDT... At 550 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Black Point, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Coral Gables, South Miami, Black Point, Kendall, The Redland, Doral, Pinecrest, Sweetwater, West Miami, Westchester, Glenvar Heights, Richmond West, Fountainbleau, Richmond Heights, Country Walk, Kendale Lakes, Palmetto Bay, Cutler Bay and University Of Miami. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
